body.name: BRUVI The Bruvi Bundle | Single-Serve Coffee System | Includes 20 Coffee and Espresso B-Pods + Bruvi Coffee Brewer + Premium Water Filter Kit
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 50 mins
features: WORKS EXCLUSIVELY WITH BRUVI B-PODS: Patent-pending advanced technology in B-PODS is only compatible with the Bruvi brewer, and vice versa. Do not use other types of pods with Bruvi.

EXCEPTIONAL COFFEE, MADE EASY: Bruvi brews expertly brews remarkably tastier coffee (hotter, stronger, smoother with noticeably less bitterness), makes seven different beverages and offers a responsible pod disposal option, all with the convenience of single-cup brewing, in a beautiful brewer that looks great on your countertop.
SEVEN DIFFERENT BEVERAGES: Bruvi brews coffee, true high pressure espresso and Americanos, cold brew, iced coffee, infused coffee and tea.

CONVENIENCE FEATURES: Bruvi offers a large touch screen, true one touch operation, instant clean hot water, quiet brew technology, 70 oz removable water tank, adjustable drip tray, and auto dispense waste bin that holds up to 6 used B-Pods.
MOBILE APP: Use the Bruvi App to brew remotely from your phone, schedule brews in advance, auto re-order B-Pods and access a personalized consumption dashboard. (App is optional)
body.description: Meet Bruvi. Finally, remarkably tastier coffee from a single-serve brewer. Bruvi is a breakthrough single-serve coffee system that brews remarkably tastier coffee, offers coffee house beverage variety and a unique, responsible pod disposal system, all with the convenience of single-cup brewing from a beautiful brewer that looks great on your counter. * B-Pods work exclusively with the Bruvi system

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Because life is too short for bad coffee. Have you ever had a really great cup of coffee from a single-serve capsule brewer? Neither had we. Fortunately, we’re a bunch of coffee people, so we decided to invent it. Bruvi makes great coffee. Remarkably tastier coffee in fact. But we didn’t stop there. We reimagined the entire single-serve experience, from the brewing technology to pod design, to the quality of coffee. Plus an ingenious solution for pod disposal. Meet Bruvi. Finally, remarkably tastier coffee from a single-serve brewer. Bruvi is a breakthrough single-serve coffee system that brews remarkably tastier coffee, offers coffee house beverage variety and a unique, responsible pod disposal system, all with the convenience of single-cup brewing from a beautiful brewer that looks great on your counter. * B-Pods work exclusively with the Bruvi system

Four Reasons Bruvi Tastes Better Auto Optimized Brewing Bruvi scans the pod and auto adjusts up to seven brew parameters and hundreds of combinations for the optimal brew, just like the roaster intended. Hygienic Brew Coffee goes straight to your mug without touching the insides of the brewer for more hygienic brew, no flavor cross contamination and no daily rinsing. More Coffee Up to 40% more coffee (15 gm) than a typical pod; 14-14.5 gm double shot espresso. Better Coffee Only super premium, craft coffee makes it into B-Pods, including a curated selection from favorite coffee companies.

More Reasons to Love Bruvi Ultimate Beverage Variety Coffee, true high pressure espresso, Americanos, cold brew, iced coffee, infused coffee and matcha latte; clean hot water. Super Premium A curated selection of craft coffee brands The Guilt Free Toss An ingenious solution for more responsible disposal. Mobile App connectivity Remote brewing, schedule in advance, personal consumption dashboard, order pods.

De La Casa Dancing Spoon Euphoria Espresso Colombia Brand Wonderland Coffee Wonderland Coffee Wonderland Coffee Mulholland Roasters Roast Medium Dark Medium Medium Light Origin Colombia, Honduras Guatemala, Colombia Colombia, Honduras Colombia Cauca Flavor Notes Chocolate, Orange Citrus, Brown Sugar Citrus, Chocolate Stone Fruit, Chocolate

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality Coffee + So Easy to Use!
reviews.reviewText: It's sleek and sexy, and I love the warmth that the wood accents bring to this coffee maker.My favorite options are the ones that allow for low-acid (less acidity in the flavor, but also less caffeine) + the Americano option when I insert an espresso pod.The first machine I got was actually broken, as it wasn't letting me do the initial cleansing cycle. But their customer service was quick to help me resolve it, and I was able to get a replacement unit.The Bruvi is great for anyone that can appreciate a good cup of coffee, but isn't so into it that they want the ritual of grinding beans each morning and using a scale and timer.The app is also great for letting you know when your brew is done (A good feature if you're making cold brew as it can take awhile), letting you know how much coffee you're drinking, and what coffee you've been brewing. I think they made this machine really simple in terms of refilling water, cleaning, and general operation.My only downside is that the pods are not accessible at local stores. Amazon has just a few selections of B-pods available. Their website does give you 20% off the pods if you set up a subscription though. Excited to try the green tea option when that releases next year!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best machine hands down!!
reviews.reviewText: 10/10… it does drip but better coffee than nespresso or keruig. Keruig was too watery to me and nespresso was just too thick almost. This is the perfect coffee and you can buy refillable pods for your favorite coffee. I can confirm it does drip but it is DEFINITELY worth rewashing the drip pan 1-2x/week. I was hesitant for the price as well but they frequently offer discounts which is when I snagged mine! The pods are also good, just can get a little pricey depending on how much coffee you drink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great at home, and great for the office!
reviews.reviewText: We have a Bruvi for the house and my husband, who is a bit of a coffee snob, had me buy one to keep at work on his desk. He could not stand the Keurig machine they have and needed something just as convenient. The minute his colleagues saw this stunning machine, everyone wants a coffee all the time -- no one wants the Keurig anymore. It's just as easy if not easier to use, and the coffee is not only delicious and premium, but there are so many more options you can make: hotter, low acid, cold brew, iced, espresso, Americano and of course, just regular coffee. And all of this in a multitude of sizes. It also helps that he can just throw the pods away and not have to open or separate them to discard correctly, thanks to their special pod that allows these to degrade in a landfill. Get one, cuz you will probably want one for everywhere you go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Have to use their coffee pods

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Defective - was really looking forward to it!
reviews.reviewText: Editing my original 1 star review:Updating my rating to a 4 star after the interaction I had with customer service. I reached out to Bruvi directly because I didn’t want a refund through Amazon, I really wanted this machine. They were quick to respond to my after hours support ticket (literally minutes after opening this morning) and on top of it responded multiple ways (email and text). They asked me to try one troubleshooting attempt and checked in immediately after to see if it worked. When I told them it still didn’t dispense water they instantly shipped out a new product even though I purchased the item through Amazon and not through them directly. They tested and inspected it first and did the cleansing cycle to make sure everything was working correctly prior to sending to me. I haven’t received it yet because this all just happened today, but I’ll be back for another update on my review when I receive it and try it out!Rated 1 star due to the item being defective- Packaging was great and the machine is a beauty! Was really looking forward to this machine but I couldn’t get past the cleaning cycle. It hums and then started blinking the tea and 10oz cup lights. I reached out to customer service, but haven’t heard back yet. Will update how they handle when I hear back!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Such a great and AWESOME product. It looks great, the coffee is so good, it’s easy to use, better for the environment, it’s more sanitary/clean than a Keurig, has more coffee per pod than a Keurig, more options/customization, and overall just way better than a Keurig.I’d like for them to have more pod options and I’d like for them to restock their only decaf coffee pod option. Hopefully, they expand and keep coming out with more pods so that it’s not as limited. Otherwise, it’s great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not only does the machine look beautiful, but their coffee is delicious! It does splash a bit if your coffee cup is too short, and their aren't very many flavors to choose from BUT they are working on creating new flavors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As close as you'll get to a perfect pod-based machine
reviews.reviewText: Where do I start? Just fantastic. The machine is attractive, feels extremely well-built, and the coffee legitimately tastes like it's coming from beans that are roasted with care and expertise.I've never owned a Keurig but have tasted enough of it to understand that it's garbage. More recently, I've been using a Jura Z6 and Nespresso Vertuo. I'd take the Bruvi over either of them for its simplicity, versatility, and flavor.If I had to identify flaws, I'm only finding two so far: 1) very limited pod selection (hopefully will change with time); 2) I would've preferred a real display to a bunch of light-up icons.
